page.title: 06A TYPICAL FRIDAY
page.content: When I first get up I pull back the quilt and put my dressing gown on and go downstairs to help my Dad to feed the cats.Then I lay the breakfast on the table. When I have laid it I sit down and have my breakfast. After breakfast I go upstairs to wash my hands and face and to clean my teeth.Then I go downstairs to make my packed lunch. For my lunch I have a white finger roll with cheese or peanut butter in it.Then I put in some sort of fruit, it is normally an apple. Then I put in some kind of biscuit and a packet of crisps. Then I play with the kittens until it is time to go to the Thomas's. Mummy drives us to the Thomas's and then we walk up to school with them. When we get to school we waitin the playground
